title: How can so many religious people think that only their religion is the true and best religion? - Quora

response.answer_text: How can so many religious people think that only their religion is the true and best religion? Let's add this to the very long list of things some accuse "those religious people" of doing that really, everyone does. Everyone believes their own views are the right ones, and everybody else's are bunk, not just "religious" people. Every human thinks they are right and anyone who disagrees is wrong. Of course they do, otherwise, they would not believe what they believe. Democrats and Republicans do this, Cubs and White Sox fans do it, those from one high school do it to those from another, abortion opponents and advocates do it, opposing philosophers do it, people from one place do it to those who live in another place, and even atheists do it. What you are describing is human, not "religious."  So how can those “religious” ones be so arrogant to DARE believe what they believe? (Wait, do only religious ones do that? Don’t we all?) Because “religious” people are people. And all people believe their views are the right views. Otherwise, they wouldn’t be “their views.” Something else would. Perhaps you don’t understand this because you’re the only human being on the planet who strongly believes that your own views are wrong? That doesn’t make a lot of sense, does it. If you believed your views were wrong, that means your views are something else. Do you believe your views are something other than what they are? No? You believe your views are right? Well, there you go then. Now you understand those silly religious people better! See how easy that was? We see this question come up every week or so. It must be a profound mystery to some people that humans actually believe what they think is true and don’t believe what they think is false. Sorry, but I must be missing something. It just doesn’t seem that complicated to me. Imagine people thinking their own views are RIGHT! That would have to mean some others might be WRONG! How DARE they!
